interestingcomments.content: Comaptiable wireless flash with SB-900 AF Speedlight /!/ I own this model for my D70. I want to enroll for a class, however it requires students to own a detachable flash. The only way for that to work is by buying a wireless remote. The model initially used with the SB-900 is no longer available - [SU-4 Wireless Remote TTL Flash Controller](https://www.nikonusa.com/en/nikon-products/product-archive/flash-adapters/su-4-wireless-remote-ttl-flash-controller.html)

Thanks!
